about_the_game:
Periculum is a casual (turn-based and real-time) strategy game in which you conquer hexagonal tiles and build your empire on them. Gather resources (such as Gold, Wood, Stone, and Fish), construct buildings, and erect walls to strengthen your empire. Choose from different game modes and engage in epic battles against bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. With an extensive range of options (similar to a sandbox), the possibilities are endless. Take your strategy to the next level by creating your own maps in the in-game level editor. The game is easy to learn, but with customizable settings, it can also offer a challenging experience. Playable with a mouse & keyboard on one screen or with motion controllers through virtual reality.

Customization and Level-Editor

Build your own custom level/map with the Level Editor and share it with your friends.

Buildings

  • University: unlock exciting upgrades for your army such as more damage or armor.
  • Marketplace: trade your collected resources with other players.
  • House: accommodates 5 residents, allowing you to train 5 more troops.
  • Wooden walls: can be used to defend one of your hexagonal tiles.
  • Stone walls: twice as strong as a wooden wall.

Soldier types:

  • Infantry: Standard
  • Cavalry: double price, double damage, double health, and can reach 2 hexagonal tiles.
  • Archer: can attack from 1 hexagonal tile away, deals standard damage but has double health. Only reaches 1 hexagonal tile per turn but can be upgraded to Cavalry Archer through University.
  • Cannon: does a lot of damage to buildings or other troops. Can hit a target 2 hexagonal tiles away. Can reach 1 hexagon per turn.
  • (Ships planned In the future)

Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 Cores @ 3GHz (i3 3250/Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050/AMD R9 370

  • VR Support: SteamVR

Choose from different game modes and options (sandbox) and engage in epic battles against bots or challenge your friends to see who comes out on top. Choose between many different maps or create your own.
